title: The Rezervoir Lounge
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Cajun, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Craft beer influenced menu. Cajun inspiration throughout menu. Full vegan menu including appetizers, entrees and a dessert. Vegan menu available Sun-Thur open-12am, $3 bar snack menu (with vegan choices) available open-close. Gluten free items available. Free Wi-Fi, jukebox, pool table, ping pong table, dart boards and golden tee. Accepts large parties (prefer reservations for 10 or more people.)
